com.programmerdan.minecraft.civspy.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.programmerdan.minecraft.civspy.database.Database

  • public class Database
extends Object
    Wrapper for Connection Pool, and holder for static strings.
    Author:
    ProgrammerDan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database(Logger log,
                String user,
                String pass,
                String host,
                int port,
                String database,
                int poolSize,
                long connectionTimeout,
                long idleTimeout,
                long maxLifetime)
        Creates the Database connection pool backed by HikariCP.
        Parameters:
        log - The logger to use
        user - The user to connection as
        pass - The password to use
        host - The host to connect to
        port - The port on the host to connect to
        database - The database to use
        poolSize - The maximum size of the connection pool
        connectionTimeout - The longest a query can run until timeout occurs
        idleTimeout - The longest a connection can sit idle before recycling
        maxLifetime - The absolute longest length of time a connection can exist

                         throws SQLException

                      Number nValue,
                      Long time,
                      Connection connection)

        Parameters:
        key -
        sValue -
        nValue -
        time - The time of sampling
        connection - The connection or null if a new connection is requested.
        Returns:
        # of records inserted

      • insertData

        public int insertData(String key,
                      String server,

                      Integer chunk_x,
                      Integer chunk_z,
                      UUID uuid,

      • insertData

        public int insertData(String key,
                      String server,
                      String world,
                      Integer chunk_x,
                      Integer chunk_z,
                      UUID uuid,
                      String sValue,
                      Number nValue,
                      Long time,
                      Connection connection)
        Fully specified insertData.
        Parameters:
        key - The stat_key to use
        server - The server to use
        world - The world to use
        chunk_x - The chunk_x of investigation
        chunk_z - The chunk_z of investigation
        uuid - The player uuid involved, if any
        sValue - The string value on the stats indicator
        nValue - The number value on the stats indicator
        time - When did sample occur or aggregate bucket was started
        connection - A connection object to ignore or use -- ignore if empty, use if not.
        Returns:
        # of records inserted.

      • batchData

        public PreparedStatement batchData(String key,
                                   String server,
                                   String world,
                                   Integer chunk_x,
                                   Integer chunk_z,
                                   UUID uuid,
                                   String sValue,
                                   Number nValue,
                                   Long time,
                                   Connection connection,
                                   PreparedStatement statement)
        Does all that insertData(String, String, String, Integer, Integer, UUID, String, Number, Long, Connection) does and more If a PreparedStatement is passed in, attempts to add this new data batch to the mix. If no PreparedStatement is found, one is made on either the provided connection or a new one, then starts a new batch. If you are using this class to manage your batch, use the returned PreparedStatement in the next call to this method for maximum success. When the batch is done just call batchExecute(Statement, boolean) on the PrepareStatement.
        Parameters:
        key -
        server -
        world -
        chunk_x -
        chunk_z -
        uuid -
        sValue -
        nValue -
        time - The time of sampling / aggregation or null to use the time-at-batching
        connection -
        statement -
        Returns:
        A PreparedStatement suitable for continued use

      • batchExecute

        public int[] batchExecute(Statement statement,
                          boolean closeConnection)
        Handles committing a batch created using the batch commands.
        Parameters:
        statement - The statement with an open batch
        closeConnection - Close the connection (return to pool) when done or no?
        Returns:
        Array of results from all batch statements.
